column1: Today I spoke with MSNBC about the assassination of Iranian scientist Mohsen Fakhrizadeh and the potential national security concerns surrounding President Trump's personal financial liabilities    https://t.co/E6REziCMTT
Happy Thanksgiving!  Few holidays bring Americans together like Thanksgiving and in a year of unfathomable turmoil and loss we need to come together now more than ever -- even if only virtually!

I spoke with NBC's Zerlina Maxwell about the Presidential transition process -- what we've lost through the Trump administration's stonewalling and how we can make sure it doesn't happen again  https://t.co/QHBAYrzU4t

Biden is filling his cabinet with seasoned experts choosing substance over style.  The contrast with the Trump administration could not be any more stark ... and a welcome change as we confront the most challenging crisis in a generation  https://t.co/MGMT9tzjOm

After weeks of dangerous political games and outright falsehoods the Trump administration has bowed to pressure and formally begun the transition process with President-elect Joe Biden ...  This is a huge win for our democracy!   https://t.co/SSqYZPHsRd

The Trump administration could be summed up in one word: deregulation  The ultimate goal is to dismantle the laws and norms that safeguard our society and replace them with unmitigated cronyism where hucksters and con artists take top billing  https://t.co/2o3VcqckVY

Every day the Trump administration refuses to acknowledge President-elect Biden's increasingly decisive victory is another day the Biden transition team could have been working to end this pandemic.  Pres. Trump continues to put ego before country  https://t.co/6dhm0SqHEd

Happy Veterans Day! Thank you for your service and sacrifice.  As our most cherished institutions continue to come under attack this Veterans Day should be a reminder of the tremendous cost of our rights and freedoms!

I applaud my Republican colleagues Reps. Reed Rooney Kinzinger Mitchell Upton Young and Hurd as well as Sens. Romney Collins Murkowski and Sasse who have accepted the election results but they are unfortunately in the minority in the Republican Party

The Trump administration is playing a dangerous game with our democracy. But make no mistake this is not a winning strategy.  Donald Trump has lost; it's time for Republicans to put country over party and recognize President-elect Joe Biden  https://t.co/kBUgakbU2i

Congratulations to Pfizer and BioNTech for their promising preliminary vaccine results!  But don't take that mask off yet! As I wrote in The Hill it's absolutely critical that the FDA not rush the vaccine approval process!   https://t.co/M3lWAnAr1Q

The 21st Ward really showed up on Election Day with almost 96% of the vote going to Joe Biden and Kamala Harris. Incredible support for the first African-American and South-Asian-American woman Vice President in US history!

I was honored today to join Alderman Howard Brookins Mayor Lori Lightfoot and Cook County Commissioner Stanley Moore among many others in celebrating the historic victory of President and VP elect Joe Biden and Kamala Harris! https://t.co/OGd8uIXcNY
Congratulations to President-elect Joe Biden and Vice President-elect Kamala Harris. Thank you for your work thank you for your service. Let's get to work!
I am honored to announce that I have been re-elected to a third term in the United States Congress with more than 70% of the vote!
Tomorrow your voice will be heard.
From sea to shining sea every Americans vote must count.
We can win this! Vote call prepare!
As we reach a new record number of cases I ask all of you to be safe be prudent and wear a mask.
Vote like everything depends on it because it does!

I believe the best way to accomplish that is by adding a public option under the Obamacare health insurance exchanges so that people and families have an affordable alternative to private insurance.
I believe that healthcare in this country should be a right and not a privilege and that we must continue to strive to attain universal coverage.
I regret that millions of Americans have lost coverage under Obamacare through the Trump Administration’s policies and regulations that are hostile to its intent.
It has afforded millions of Americans who formerly lacked health insurance coverage they need while preventing insurance companies from excluding those with pre-existing conditions.
I strongly support the Affordable Care Act and have voted consistently against Republican attempts to cripple or repeal it. https://t.co/8S2MJOnaCR
So proud to live in a country celebrating the hard work and well-earned gains of union labor. Thank you to all those who came before us for the work you have done. We will continue the fight.
We need decency in the White House. Proud to stand with the men and women of our military.

There is no excuse for overpaying for ventilators when we already had a cheaper contract in place. Americans deserve proper healthcare and working ventilators not mismanaged contracts that waste time and money.
We should never waste the taxpayers' money—and during a pandemic no less! https://t.co/NP2pzmjr3Y
We must get to the bottom of what happened with our ventilators. Misconduct (during a pandemic!) will not go unexamined and unpunished.  https://t.co/3QGknw7UA5

The Post Office belongs to the people. It is enshrined in our nation's greatest document. Article I Section 8 Clause 7 of the United States Constitution. 🇺🇸📫 https://t.co/S1FSRabUwP

And to make all Laws which shall be necessary and proper for carrying into Execution the foregoing Powers and all other Powers vested by this Constitution in the Government of the United States or in any Department or Officer thereof.'

...and to exercise like Authority over all Places purchased by the Consent of the Legislature of the State in which the Same shall be for the Erection of Forts Magazines Arsenals dock-Yards and other needful Buildings;

To exercise exclusive Legislation in all Cases whatsoever over such District (not exceeding ten Miles square) as may by Cession of particular States and the Acceptance of Congress become the Seat of Government of the United States...
...reserving to the States respectively the Appointment of the Officers and the Authority of training the Militia according to the discipline prescribed by Congress;
To provide for organizing arming and disciplining the Militia and for governing such Part of them as may be employed in the Service of the United States...
To make Rules for the Government and Regulation of the land and naval Forces; To provide for calling forth the Militia to execute the Laws of the Union suppress Insurrections and repel Invasions;

To declare War grant Letters of Marque and Reprisal and make Rules concerning Captures on Land and Water; To raise and support Armies but no Appropriation of Money to that Use shall be for a longer Term than two Years; To provide and maintain a Navy;
To constitute tribunals inferior to the Supreme Court; To define and punish piracies and felonies committed on the high seas and offenses against the law of nations;
To promote the progress of science and useful arts by securing for limited times to authors and inventors the exclusive right to their respective writings and discoveries;
To establish post offices and post roads;

To coin money regulate the value thereof and of foreign coin and fix the standard of weights and measures; To provide for the punishment of counterfeiting the securities and current coin of the United States;

To borrow money on the credit of the United States; To regulate commerce with foreign nations and among the several states and with the Indian tribes; To establish a uniform rule of naturalization and uniform laws on the subject of bankruptcies throughout the United States;

'The Congress shall have power to lay and collect taxes duties imposts and excises to pay the debts and provide for the common defense and general welfare of the United States; but all duties imposts and excises shall be uniform throughout the United States;
Article 1 Section 8 of the United States Constitution:
